instruction: I am Isabelle Mercier, my email is isabelle_mercier@apple.fr. I request to remove the track 'Hats Off To (Roy) Harper' (TrackID: 1645, InvoiceLineId: 1997) from my invoice (InvoiceID: 368) and replace it with 'Moth' (TrackID: 3400) priced at 0.99 for 1 unit.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM customers WHERE Email = 'isabelle_mercier@apple.fr';
SELECT InvoiceId FROM invoices WHERE InvoiceId = 368 AND CustomerId = ?;
DELETE FROM invoice_items WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1997 AND InvoiceId = 368 AND TrackId = 1645;
INSERT INTO invoice_items (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (368, 3400, 0.99, 1);

error_info: Error: Incorrect number of bindings supplied. The current statement uses 1, and there are 0 supplied.

instruction: I am Aaron Mitchell (CustomerID 32). I recently purchased 'Da Lama Ao Caos' (TrackID 275, InvoiceLineId 625) via invoice #116. Please add this track to my '90â€™s Music' playlist (PlaylistID 5).

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId, FirstName, LastName FROM customers WHERE CustomerId = 32;

error_info: Error: UNIQUE constraint failed: playlist_track.PlaylistId, playlist_track.TrackId
